titles.title: Savior, lead me lest I stray

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Savior, lead me lest I stray, Gently lead me all the way; I am safe when by Thy side, I would in Thy love abide.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Lead me, lead me, Savior, lead me, lest I stray; Gently down the stream of time, Lead me, Savior, all the way.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Thou the refuge of my soul, When life's stormy billows roll; I am safe when Thou art nigh, On Thy mercy I rely.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Savior, lead me, then at last, When the storm of life is past; I shall reach the land of day, Where all tears are wiped away.
